roleset.name: purchase a debt so as to free money that would have been used for debt service for other uses

example.name: gerund, arb control
example.text: Yunfa Zhu and Yanqun Zhang , economic scholars of China 's Social Science Institute , said : " [*] monetizing housing allocation is a large trend " .
